text:
With the support of a grant from the LEP's Business Resilience and Recovery Scheme, Ipswich business DXB Pump & Power was able to diversify and start a new contract for the @EnvAgency during Covid-19.
https://t.co/CBeqoiiPlM
#Funding #Grants #businesssupport

text:
#Weather warnings are in place for the #UK from today through Sunday.

See https://t.co/JpCgohQICt for up to date information & stay #WeatherAware.

The @CompassInsUK Major Incident Hotline is available 24/7/365: https://t.co/sbPAc6hXpC.

@BHHPA @metoffice @EnvAgency @metoffice https://t.co/uCEUX1OShF

Work is well underway on Ponteland Flood Scheme with piling work taking place for the new flood wall. 

Here's Project Manager Kirsty Harwood explaining more about the project. 

Read more: https://t.co/D3qfBCWvio 

#flood #river
@EnvAgency @N_landCouncil @Morpeth_Herald https://t.co/L6bzIJ1D0T
